titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at St. Michaels Woodstreet (December 23, 1680) at the funeral of Ezerel Tonge ... memorable for his good service to the nation in the first discovery of the horrid Popish Plot / by T.J., author of the Hearts right Sovereign ...
titleStmt.author: Jones, Thomas, 1622?-1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by N.T., and are to be sold by T. Parkhurst ... B. Shirley ... and W. Hinchman ...,
